definition: a badly assembled collection of parts hastily assembled to serve some particular purpose, often used to refer to computing systems or software that has been badly put together
details:
noun
- a badly assembled collection of parts hastily assembled to serve some particular purpose, often used to refer to computing systems or software that has been badly put together
= example: a badly assembled collection of parts hastily assembled to serve some particular purpose, often used to refer to computing systems or software that has been badly put together
